channel.title: Ssh on Post It!
channel.description: Recent content in Ssh on Post It!

item.title: Ssh keys exchange
item.description: A superfast note on how to exchange ssh keys in order to connect without the need to remember a password. On both the computer (A and B): ssh-keygen ssh-copy-id -i you@B ssh you@B # to check if it works If it doesn’t work try: cat .ssh/id_rsa.pub | ssh b@B 'cat >> .ssh/authorized_keys'
